sentence.Network_en: Two boats managed to get away and eventually hit upon the desert island of Trebucket.
sentence.Network_cn: 两条小艇离开了沉船,最后来到特里巴克特这座荒岛.

means.word_mean: 1. medieval artillery used during sieges; a heavy war engine for hurling large stones and other missiles
